title: Real Personal Income: Metropolitan Portion for Massachusetts
notes:
Real personal income is personal income at RPPs divided by the national PCE price index. It is estimated for states, state metro/nonmetro portions, metropolitan statistical areas, and the combined nonmetropolitan portion of the United States.

Metropolitan portion consists of all counties in a state that are parts of metropolitan statistical areas.

For more information about this release go to http://www.bea.gov/newsreleases/regional/rpp/rpp_newsrelease.htm or http://www.bea.gov/regional/methods.cfm.
